items.sentence: I think the person you\'re looking for might be Tom.
I wish I hadn\'t given Tom my grandfather\'s violin.
I\'m calling because my credit card has been stolen.
Tom and Mary said they want to go to Boston with us.
Tom won\'t permit Mary to go to the party with John.
Tom\'s house is powered by solar panels on the roof.
Tom used to drink a lot, but now he\'s a teetotaler.
How much of Tom\'s speech did you really understand?
Tom wasn\'t able to say what he wanted to in French.
Tom couldn\'t possibly have known what was going on.
